price: Perumpamaan surga yang dijanjikan kepada orang-orang yang takwa ialah (seperti taman), mengalir sungai-sungai di dalamnya; buahnya tak henti-henti sedang naungannya (demikian pula).  Itulah tempat kesudahan bagi orang-orang yang bertakwa, sedang tempat kesudahan bagi orang-orang kafir ialah neraka.
arabic: ۞ مَّثَلُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ أُكُلُهَا دَآئِمٞ وَظِلُّهَاۚ تِلۡكَ عُقۡبَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْۚ وَّعُقۡبَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mathalu al-janati allatī wuʿida al-mutaqūna tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru ukuluhā dāimun waẓilluhā til'ka ʿuq'bā alladhīna ittaqaw waʿuq'bā al-kāfirīna al-nāru
